${ModID}:DesignersBrush.NAME: Designer's Brush
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if there are no #yUpgraded cards in your hand, #yUpgrade all cards in your hand.

${ModID}:SlimeUvula.NAME: Slime Uvula
${ModID}:SlimeUvula.FLAVOR: Fun fact: Due to the composition of their bodies, slimes never become thirsty.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have no empty potion slots at the end of combat, heal #b2 HP.

${ModID}:Life.NAME: Life?
${ModID}:Life.FLAVOR: a cute flower pot :) wait what is that growing in the middle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yConstricted. Whenever you lose HP from #yConstricted, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${ModID}:Pebbles.NAME: Pebbles
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Defends give you #b1 more #yBlock.

${ModID}:ArtOfPeace.NAME: Art of Peace
${ModID}:ArtOfPeace.FLAVOR: This book is banned from ninja libraries.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a Smoke Bomb, gain #b50 #yGold.

${ModID}:PetRock.NAME: Pet Rock
${ModID}:PetRock.FLAVOR: It's okay, Rocky. You go when you feel like it.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play no cards during your turn, gain [E] next turn.

${ModID}:PaperNail.NAME: Paper Nail
${ModID}:PaperNail.FLAVOR: "Does this one have a use?" - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: If you are at #b1 HP, your #yAttacks deal triple damage.

${ModID}:SuperheroComic.NAME: Superhero Comic
${ModID}:SuperheroComic.FLAVOR: I guess you could say I'm-
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b60 #yInvincible.

${ModID}:RingOfTheNoodle.NAME: Ring of the Noodle
${ModID}:RingOfTheNoodle.FLAVOR: A participation trophy from the Foglands.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b2 additional cards if you have at least #b3 #yInnate cards in your deck.

${ModID}:Supplements.NAME: Supplements
${ModID}:Supplements.FLAVOR: We don't get much Vitamin D in the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your Max HP is raised, raise it by #b1 more.

${ModID}:HospitalBill.NAME: Hospital Bill
${ModID}:HospitalBill.FLAVOR: Wait, how much is the bill?? On second thought, I think I feel fine.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose Max HP, heal all of your HP.

${ModID}:WellDoneSteak.NAME: Well Done Steak
${ModID}:WellDoneSteak.FLAVOR: Congratulations!!!! We're so proud of you :D
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b3, heal #b1 HP.

${ModID}:LonelyAnt.NAME: Lonely Ant
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no #yUncommon or #yRare cards in your hand, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:NapiersBones.NAME: Napier's Bones
${ModID}:NapiersBones.FLAVOR: Probably useful at some point, though not now.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you shuffle your draw pile each combat, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength and #b1 temporary #yDexterity.

${ModID}:LostPenny.NAME: Lost Penny
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop room, gain #b10 #yGold.

${ModID}:Popcorn.NAME: Popcorn
${ModID}:Popcorn.FLAVOR: "Those gremlins put on such a show! Loved the finale in particular." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b3 #yBlock if you have no cards in your draw pile.

${ModID}:InsuranceCard.NAME: Insurance Card
${ModID}:InsuranceCard.FLAVOR: I KNEW this would come in handy!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, if you have #b0 #yGold, gain #b150 #yGold.

${ModID}:TyrtleShell.NAME: Tyrtle Shell
${ModID}:TyrtleShell.FLAVOR: Tyrtles are said to have sought refuge underground since the Spireblight.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if there are no #yAttacks in your deck, gain #b5 #yDexterity.

${ModID}:RayOfMoonlight.NAME: Ray of Moonlight
${ModID}:RayOfMoonlight.FLAVOR: "Lay low. If The Ancients catch us building this..." - Kublai the Great
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if there are no #yRare cards in your deck, gain #b2 #yArtifact.

${ModID}:StylePoints.NAME: Style Points
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you defeat a Boss, gain #b1 #yGold for each unique card in your deck.

${ModID}:PaintBucket.NAME: Paint Bucket
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose #b100 or more #yGold at once, increase your max HP by #b1.

${ModID}:HeirloomFork.NAME: Heirloom Fork
${ModID}:HeirloomFork.FLAVOR: The former owner of this fork paid around 140 Gold for it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remove a #rCurse from your deck, #yUpgrade a random #yBasic card in your deck.

${ModID}:FistOfThePugilist.NAME: Fist of the Pugilist
${ModID}:FistOfThePugilist.FLAVOR: "Use your most expected attack, and it will be unexpected." - Kublai the Great
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yBasic Strike, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:RedButton.NAME: Red Button
${ModID}:RedButton.FLAVOR: Only to be pressed in times of desperation.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of Boss and Elite combats, deal #b15 damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Neurotoxin.NAME: Neurotoxin
${ModID}:Neurotoxin.FLAVOR: Aha! A deadly concoction to residents of the Spire. This should make the climb easy...right?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn #b15, set the HP of ALL enemies to #b0.
